attributes.action: change the law on squatters rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can it be that people who have legal title to a property can be forced out by so called squatters, who are no more than chancers who spot an opportunity to ruin someone else's life by stealing their homes. Surely people who have paid their stamp duty to th egovernment should be protected!
